evidence.text: 15   MOTION to Dismiss by City Of Houston, filed. Motion Docket Date 3/2/2017.

extracted.value: City of Houston filed a Motion to Dismiss on February 9, 2017, seeking dismissal of the plaintiffs' complaint.

evidence.text: 25   Amended MOTION to Dismiss or, in the Alternative, Amended Motion for Summary Judgment by City Of Houston, filed. Motion Docket Date 4/5/2017.

extracted.value: City of Houston filed an Amended Motion to Dismiss or, in the Alternative, Amended Motion for Summary Judgment on March 15, 2017.

evidence.text: 36   WITHDRAWN per Notice #39 MOTION for Entry of Order re: PLAINTIFFS' MOTION FOR ENTRY OF ESI PROTOCOL AND TO COMPEL PRODUCTION OF DOCUMENTS PURSUANT THERETO by Juan Hernandez, DeQuan Kirkwood, Manuel Trevino, Kent Wheatfall, filed. Motion Docket Date 11/7/2017.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a Motion for Entry of Order regarding their ESI Protocol and to Compel Production of Documents on October 17, 2017, which was later withdrawn.

evidence.text: 47   MOTION to Compel Production and For Discovery Sanctions by Juan Hernandez, DeQuan Kirkwood, Manuel Trevino, Kent Wheatfall, filed. Motion Docket Date 3/21/2018.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a Motion to Compel Production and For Discovery Sanctions on February 28, 2018, seeking compliance with discovery requests.

evidence.text: 59   MOTION to Enforce The Court's April 10, 2018 Order as to 58 Memorandum and Order, by Juan Hernandez, DeQuan Kirkwood, Manuel Trevino, Kent Wheatfall, filed. Motion Docket Date 6/6/2018.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a Motion to Enforce the Court's April 10, 2018 Order on May 16, 2018, to compel the defendant to produce documents.

evidence.text: 86   MOTION to Certify Class by Juan Hernandez, DeQuan Kirkwood, Manuel Trevino, Kent Wheatfall, filed. Motion Docket Date 1/2/2019.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a Motion to Certify Class on December 11, 2018, seeking class certification for the case.

evidence.text: 145   MOTION for Summary Judgment by City Of Houston, filed. Motion Docket Date 7/17/2019.

extracted.value: City of Houston filed a Motion for Summary Judgment on June 26, 2019, seeking summary judgment on the merits of the case.

evidence.text: 149   MOTION to Exclude The Expert Report and Testimony of Karen Albert by Eric Aguirre, Juan Hernandez, DeQuan Kirkwood, Manuel Trevino, Kent Wheatfall, filed. Motion Docket Date 7/19/2019.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a Motion to Exclude The Expert Report and Testimony of Karen Albert on June 28, 2019, seeking exclusion of expert testimony.

evidence.text: 150   MOTION for Summary Judgment by Eric Aguirre, Juan Hernandez, DeQuan Kirkwood, Manuel Trevino, Kent Wheatfall, filed. Motion Docket Date 7/19/2019.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a Motion for Summary Judgment on June 29, 2019, seeking summary judgment on the merits of the case.

evidence.text: 155   Opposed MOTION to Stay Pending Interlocutory Appeal by City Of Houston, filed. Motion Docket Date 7/31/2019.

extracted.value: City of Houston filed an Opposed Motion to Stay Pending Interlocutory Appeal on July 10, 2019, seeking a stay pending appeal.
